aiCoach.title: AI Coach
aiCoach.subtitle: Your personal Points of You guide
aiCoach.welcome: Hello {{name}}! I'm here to guide you through your Points of You journey. What's on your mind today?

quotes.title: Inspiration
quotes.subtitle: Words of wisdom
quotes.growth: We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.
quotes.change: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.journey: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.potential: The greatest discovery of any generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitude of mind.
quotes.perspective: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
quotes.courage: There is no passion to be found playing small – in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.wisdom: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.mindfulness: The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.

responses.transition: Transitions can feel overwhelming, but they're also opportunities for growth. What aspect of this change feels most challenging right now?
responses.leadership: Leadership starts with self-awareness. What qualities do you see in leaders you admire, and how might you cultivate those in yourself?
responses.fear: Fear often points us toward what matters most. What would you do if you knew you couldn't fail?
responses.goals: Goals are dreams with deadlines. What small step could you take today toward what you truly want?
responses.reflection: That's a thoughtful perspective. What feelings come up for you when you think about this situation?
responses.exploration: I'm curious about your experience. Can you tell me more about what this means to you?
responses.insight: There's wisdom in your words. How might this understanding change how you approach similar situations?
responses.encouragement: You're showing real courage in exploring these ideas. What would it look like to trust yourself more?

demo.title: Multilingual {{app}}
demo.subtitle: Experience the power of global accessibility
demo.rtlDescription: Notice how the layout automatically adapts when you switch to Hebrew (עברית):
demo.layoutDescription: This content flows naturally in both directions
demo.textDirectionExample: This text demonstrates proper text direction handling. Numbers like 123 and English words maintain their correct orientation even in RTL mode.

feature.multiLanguageDesc: Full support for English, Spanish, French, German, and Hebrew
feature.rtlSupportDesc: Complete right-to-left layout support for Hebrew
feature.localeFormattingDesc: Dates and numbers adapt to local conventions
feature.accessibilityDesc: Screen reader friendly with proper ARIA labels
feature.contextAwareDesc: Translations adapt based on usage context

demo.instruction1: Use the language switcher above to change languages
demo.instruction2: Try Hebrew (עברית) to see RTL layout in action
demo.instruction3: Notice how dates and numbers format differently
demo.instruction4: All interactive elements work seamlessly in any language
